Protocol ID: A unique ID for this protocol.
Protocol name: A short, descriptive name for the protocol that need not be unique.
Protocol description: A general description of the protocol.
Publication DOI: The publication digital object identifier (doi) associated with the protocol.
protocols.io DOI: The protocols.io digital object identifier (doi) associated with the protocol.
Document filename: A filename of a PDF document containing the details of the protocol.
Collection method: The name of a process type being used.
Collection method ontology: An ontology term identifier in the form prefix:accession

Protocol ID: FILL OUT INFORMATION BELOW THIS ROW

Protocol description: Colonic biopsy samples were collected from patients attending for clinically indicated endoscopy procedures at Oxford University Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust (OUHFT) following written informed consent.

The large intestine was removed and flushed with ice-cold Dulbecco’s (Ca2+& Mg2+ free) phosphate buffered saline (D-PBS, Sigma, UK) containing 100 U/mL penicillin and 100 μg/mL streptomycin (Sigma, UK).
